name: SNOWBALL FIGHT

description: A wall of fire blocks your opponent's next move.

name: SNOWSTORM
description: A sudden snowstorm covers the arena, changing the game.

name: WATERFALL
description: A powerful waterfall sweeps away obstacles.

name: FIRE SPIN
description: Spin of fire reverses the flow of battle.

name: SNOW SHIELD
description: A shield of snow protects you from harm.

name: WATER BLAST

name: SNOW BLOCK

name: WATER BARRIER

name: SNOW ROLL
description: Roll of snow changes strategy.
